channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A tale of two U.S. interventions and why Venezuela is not Panama 2.0
item.description: Operation Absolute Resolve, that resulted in the capture of Nicolás Maduro, echoes the 1990 U.S. invasion of Panama that brought down Manuel Noriega. ...

item.title: Trump wants U.S. oil companies in Venezuela. Here's what to know

item.title: Wellness trends worth taking into the new year (and some that aren't)
item.description: We reported on all sorts of products and practices promising to make you healthy last year. Here are the ones that stood up to science, and those that...

item.title: Bowen: Trump's action could set precedent for authoritarian powers across globe
item.description: Trump seems to believe he makes the rules and others cannot have the same privileges.

item.title: Police identify 16 more victims of Swiss bar fire
item.description: Among those killed by the blaze at Le Constellation is 16-year-old Swiss national Arthur Brodard, his mother confirms.

item.title: Thousands stranded across Europe as Greece airspace disrupted
item.description: A fault with radio communications caused air traffic controllers to temporarily suspend arrivals and departures.

item.title: Nature: Lake Champlain in New York
item.description: We leave you this Sunday Morning along the frozen shores of Lake Champlain in upper New York State. Videographer: Jamie McDonald.

item.title: World reaction to U.S. strikes on Venezuela pours in
item.description: Many U.S. adversaries condemned the U.S. strikes on Venezuela, while other governments called for deescalation.

item.title: Schools to start reopening after Nigeria mass abduction
item.description: Schools in "safe and secure areas" will be allowed to reopen after 250 children were taken in November.

item.title: Who's in charge of Venezuela and what happens next?
item.description: Donald Trump says the US will "run" Venezuela until a "safe" transition after capturing its president and first lady.

item.title: Wisconsin judge convicted of obstructing arrest of immigrant resigns as GOP threatens impeachment
US plans to ‘run’ Venezuela and tap its oil reserves, Trump says, after operation to oust Maduro
